languages.text: В текущей ситуации команде пригодится более мощное оружие. Возможно, что-то можно найти на офицерской палубе.

traits.locale_text: В текущей ситуации команде пригодится более мощное оружие. Возможно, что-то можно найти на офицерской палубе.

languages.text: The crew need more powerful weapons for the coming battle. Maybe something suitable can be found on the officers' deck.
languages.original_text: В текущей ситуации команде пригодится более мощное оружие. Возможно, что-то можно найти на офицерской палубе.

traits.locale_text: The crew need more powerful weapons for the upcoming battle. Maybe something suitable can be found on the officers' deck.
The crew need more powerful weapons for the coming battle. Maybe something suitable can be found on the officers' deck.
The crew need more powerful weapons for the coming battle. Maybe something suitable can be found on the officers' deck.

languages.text: Die Crew braucht stärkere Waffen für die bevorstehende Schlacht. Vielleicht findet sich etwas Brauchbares auf dem Offiziersdeck.
languages.original_text: The crew need more powerful weapons for the coming battle. Maybe something suitable can be found on the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: Die Crew braucht stärkere Waffen für die bevorstehende Schlacht. Vielleicht findet sich etwas Brauchbares auf dem Offiziersdeck.

languages.text: L'équipage a besoin d'armes plus puissantes pour la bataille à venir. Vous trouverez peut-être ce qu'il vous faut sur le pont des officiers.
languages.original_text: The crew need more powerful weapons for the coming battle. Maybe something suitable can be found on the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: L'équipage a besoin d'armes plus puissantes pour la bataille à venir. Vous trouverez peut-être ce qu'il vous faut sur le pont des officiers.

languages.text: 船员需要更强大的武器，应付即将到来的战斗。或许军官甲板上会有合适的武器。
languages.original_text: The crew need more powerful weapons for the coming battle. Maybe something suitable can be found on the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: 船员需要更强大的武器，应付即将到来的战斗。或许军官甲板上会有合适的武器。

languages.text: 来たる戦いに備えて、クルーにはさらなるパワーウェポンが必要だ。士官デッキになら何か使えるものがあるかもしれない。
languages.original_text: The crew need more powerful weapons for the coming battle. Maybe something suitable can be found on the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: 来たる戦いに備えて、クルーにはさらなるパワーウェポンが必要だ。士官デッキになら何か使えるものがあるかもしれない。

languages.text: La tripulación necesitará armas mejores para el combate que se avecina. Tal vez haya algo adecuado en la cubierta de oficiales.
languages.original_text: The crew need more powerful weapons for the coming battle. Maybe something suitable can be found on the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación necesitará armas mejores para el combate que se avecina. Tal vez haya algo adecuado en la cubierta de oficiales.

languages.text: Ekibin yaklaşan çatışma için daha güçlü silahlara ihtiyacı var. Belki subay güvertesinde uygun bir şey bulabilirler.
languages.original_text: The crew need more powerful weapons for the coming battle. Maybe something suitable can be found on the officers' deck.

traits.locale_text: Ekibin yaklaşan çatışma için daha güçlü silahlara ihtiyacı var. Belki subay güvertesinde uygun bir şey bulabilirler.
